remarks: The result of a subgroup operation is the same as the result of its parent operation.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jul-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
subgores.1 $e |- W = ran H $.
subgoov $p |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ ( A e. W /\ B e. W ) ) -> ( A H B ) = ( A G B ) ) $.
